TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 將 物件來回轉換成其他型別。

span.span: Converts a object to and from other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別只會轉換成執行個體進出。The class only converts an instance to and from a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有相關的內容，內容也會檢查序列化的值是否在範圍內的`Key`值。If a context is involved, context also checks whether the value to serialize is within range for a `Key` value.
